wikipedia_page.main: Lieutenant-General  Charles Wright Younghusband  (20 June 1821 – 28 October  1899) CB FRS was a British Army officer and meteorologist.

response: Francis Younghusband was born in 1863 at Murree, British India (now Pakistan), to a British military family, being the brother of Major-General George Younghusband and the second son of Major-General John W. Younghusband and his wife Clara Jane Shaw. Clara's brother, Robert Shaw, was a noted explorer of Central Asia. His uncle Lieutenant-General Charles Younghusband CB FRS, was a British Army officer and meteorologist.
In 1842, his daughter, Mary Elizabeth, married Lieutenant-General Charles Younghusband CB FRS, a British Army officer and meteorologist.
Their uncle was Lt-Gen. Charles Younghusband, an Army officer and meteorologist.Burke's Landed Gentry 1952, pg 2826, Younghusband pedigree
